name: CallofMeme
description: The official token powering the Call of Meme ecosystem. Upgrade your operatives, stake for rewards, and dominate the battlefield with enhanced tactical capabilities. Operative Upgrades Use tokens to upgrade your operatives to maximum stats and unlock their full potential Token Staking Stake your tokens to earn passive rewards and support the meme warfare ecosystem Rewards & Community Earn tokens through gameplay achievements and participate in community events NOW Payments Integration Purchase exclusive items, skins, and battle passes using your tokens
